en-US.name: Alexa Dev Tips
en-US.summary: Meet Dev Tips, your companion for the skill-building journey. Find the news, tips, and resources you need to build your best skill—all via voice.
en-US.description:
Building skills to make Alexa smarter? Meet Dev Tips, your companion for the skill-building journey. This skill is designed to connect you with the news, tips, and resources you need to build your best skill—all via voice.

As you build your skills, you’ll likely have questions about how to add features or enhance existing ones. Simply enable the Dev Tips skill and ask for help, like "Alexa, ask Dev Tips about persistence." If you don’t have a specific question, you can also just say, "Alexa, ask Dev Tips for something new," and DevTips will randomly pick something from the knowledge base to help you broaden your development skills. And if you’d like to hear the latest Alexa Developer news and announcements, simply say, "Alexa, ask Dev Tips for the news."

Enable Dev Tips now to have a skill development co-pilot.
